header.title: About PrêtFacile
header.subtitle: Since 2008, we have helped thousands of people achieve their projects with tailored and accessible financing solutions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Making credit accessible and transparent for everyone, while supporting each client in achieving their personal and professional projects.

listen.title: Listening to You
listen.desc: We take the time to understand your needs and projects to offer you the best solution.

expertise.title: Recognized Expertise
expertise.desc: Over 15 years of experience in the credit sector to support you with confidence.

personalSupport.title: Personalized Support
personalSupport.desc: A dedicated advisor guides you through every step of your loan application.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.desc: Clear terms with no hidden fees. You know exactly what you are paying.

team.title: A Team of Experts at Your Service
team.text1: Our team of specialized advisors is trained to provide the best possible support. We review each file carefully and offer personalized solutions tailored to your situation.
team.text2: Whether you want to finance a major purchase, carry out renovations, or realize a personal project, we are here to guide and advise you every step of the way.

points.advice: Free Advice: Our experts answer all your questions
points.fastStudy: Quick Review: Preliminary response within 24 hours
points.followUp: Personalized Follow-up: A dedicated advisor until funds are released

why.title: Why Choose Us?
why.competitiveRates_desc: We negotiate the best rates for your profile
why.flexibility_desc: Possibility of early repayment with no fees
